data.title: Buy Gift Cards & Gift Vouchers
data.meta_description: Buy most popular gift card and gift vouchers online! Personalize and digitally send them via email or SMS! Choose from 900+ Top Brands.
data.text:
Find the perfect gift for your loved ones with the Joyalukkas e-gift . Choose from an exquisite range of intricately crafted jewellery to make your special ones feel even more special. Be it Polki, Diamonds, Pearls, Gold and other precious collections; find everything you’re looking for at the best rates and best quality. So surprise someone, make someone smile today with a priceless gift from Joyalukkas. You can even customize your gift message to make it something special with personal touch.

Ten countries, 95 outlets, over one million designs, and millions of delighted customers recognized and regarded Joyalukkas as one of the world’s favourite jewellers and one of the most fashionable designer brands. The superlative quality and purity of the material, the intricacy of designs, well trained friendly customer service team ensure that the brand wins the hearts of our customers.

This eGift Card is not redeemable for gold coins and gold bars.

This eGift Card is redeemable in any Joyalukkas Jewellery outlet in the respective countries as per the currency indicated in the Gift Card.

For store locations, visit : https://eshop.joyalukkas.com/store/

This eGift Card is only valid for a one time purchase to the full value unless otherwise specified.

This eGift Card is valid for 6 months from the date of purchase.

eGift Cards once issued cannot be canceled, exchanged, extended or refunded and are subject to the terms & conditions of the merchant.

Items purchased using this eGift Card are refundable as per the refund and exchange policy of the merchant. The merchant is solely responsible for the product & service provided to customers through the use of this eGift Card.
